About
J. Alexander’s
We believe cooking is love, and everyone deserves to enjoy a high-quality meal with the friends and family. That is why we do everything we can to create a memorable dining experience.  No matter the location or time of day you choose to dine with us, if you don’t leave 100% satisfied, we promise to make it right.
Home
>
About Us
Find a nearby location
Want to dine in for lunch or dinner or order carryout from
J. Alexander’s?
Start by locating your nearest restaurant to help make a reservation, place an order, or answer any questions you may have about our menu, dress attire, available wines, and more.
Find A  J. Alexander’s
J. Alexander’s Menu and Specialty Wines
Peruse our selection of appetizers and small plates to compliment your wine experience. We take great care to select a variety of wines that include some of the best fine wines from around the world. Whether you want to enjoy a glass or bottle with the table, we offer a perfect pairing of food and wine that you’ll be sure to enjoy.
View Our Menu
Gift Cards
Celebrating a special occasion or looking for an excellent gift? Try giving a fine dining experience with a personalized gift card from J. Alexander’s. Our gift cards never expire and can be redeemed anytime for either dine-in or carryout.
Purchase J. Alexander’s Gift Cards
Start Your Career At
J. Alexander’s
The happiness of our employees is our top priority which is why we offer training, competitive pay, and growth opportunities to all
J. Alexander’s
employees. We know a happy wait staff, management, and kitchen help ensure a positive experience for guests and strive to provide a real career to all employees who choose to work alongside us. Come work with us today!
Apply Now
